00200 inline pandora::StatusCode FineGranularityContent::RegisterAlgorithms(pandora::Pandora &pandora)
00201 {
00202     FINE_GRANULARITY_ALGORITHM_LIST(PANDORA_REGISTER_ALGORITHM);
00203 
00204     return pandora::STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00205 }

00209 inline pandora::StatusCode FineGranularityContent::RegisterHelperFunctions(pandora::Pandora &pandora)
00210 {
00211     FINE_GRANULARITY_ENERGY_CORRECTION_LIST(PANDORA_REGISTER_ENERGY_CORRECTION);

00213     FINE_GRANULARITY_SETTINGS_LIST(PANDORA_REGISTER_SETTINGS);
00214 
00215     return pandora::STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00216 }
